description.value:
Very Rare Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement. may not be acquirable elsewhere. Failing Toughness test, target rolls on Fear Shock Table. Does nothing to creatures immune to fear or who follow different fear rules. For Orks, poison causes them to enter a Frenzy instead of usual effect.

Requirements

Good Craftsmanship can delay effect by 1 round, Best can delay by up to 24 hours, chosen on acquisition/creation. Temporarily replaces the "Toxic" Wep. Quality's effect if applied.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
